Dialogue.Name: OnInteract_PoliceToJunkie_Street
Dialogue.Link: "Search him for drugs" to PLAYER OnSearch

Dialogue.Name: OnSearch_PoliceToAny_Street_HasDrugs
Dialogue.Link: "I'll let you go for some greens." type ENDL

Dialogue.Name: OnSearch_PoliceToAny_Street_NoDrugs
Dialogue.Link: "Too bad. You're free to go." type ENDL
